posts.post_title: Help me complete my T206 NY Giants sub-set.....with trade bait
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Jeff W.
I am looking for any of the following cards in PSA 2-4 or SGC Equivalent


Ames-Portrait
Devore-Batting
Donlin-Batting
Doyle-Throwing/Portrait
Herzog-Standing
Mathewson-Portrait/Black Cap/White Cap
McGraw-Glove at hip/Finger in Air
Meyers-Portrait
Murray-Batting/Portrait
Myers-Batting/Fielding
Raymond-Follow Thru
Schlei-Fielding/Batting
Seymour-Batting
Snodgrass-Catching/Batting
Tenney-Portrait
Welmer-Portrait
Wilste-Portrait with cap

Here is what I have for trade:

N162-Andrews-Its raw and looks Ex, however, there is three small color touch ups on the front of the card. They don't detract from the card though, it's a beautiful card.

N154-William McKinley-Presidential Baseball card-SGC 20/1.5

T205-Danny Hoffman-PSA 5

1933 Sport Kings-
     Anton Lekang-PSA 5
     Charles Jewtraw-PSA 5
     James Wedell-PSA 5
     Gene Tunney-PSA 5
     Bobby Walthour-PSA 5
     Knute Rockne-PSA 5
     Roscoe Turner-PSA 5

1938 Goudey
     Joe Vosmik #247-PSA 5
     Bill Werber #283-PSA 5
     Julius Solters #255-PSA 5
     Bill Werber #259-PSA 5
     Frank Pytlak #245-PSA 4
     Joe Kuhel #267-PSA 4
     
If any of this looks appealing to you please email me at:
jwilliams81@mac.com

Thanks for looking
Jeff W.
